basics.name: Fabien Kovacic
basics.label: Javascript Developer
basics.summary: With a deep-rooted passion for computers, I embarked on my career as a Front-end Developer, working with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and ActionScript 3. I later honed my design skills using the Adobe Suite. In recent years, I have dedicated myself exclusively to coding, acquiring substantial experience in both front-end and back-end technologies. I am particularly enthusiastic about the JavaScript ecosystem, focusing on TypeScript, React, and Node.js, which allows me to create seamless and efficient web applications.

work.name: France Télévisions
work.summary: Joined France Télévisions to provide strong front-end expertise, manage the front-end team, and drive the adoption of best practices. The technology stack includes React, TypeScript, and Next.js. My leadership has been well-received, and I have played a key role in recruiting and training new front-end developers.
highlights: Led and mentored a front-end team, enhancing performance and code quality
Expertly utilized React, TypeScript, and Next.js to build scalable applications
Conducted interviews and successfully recruited skilled front-end developers
Developed a sophisticated rich text editor using Tiptap

work.name: Les Tilleuls
work.summary: At Les Tilleuls, a self-managed and egalitarian company (Scop), I undertake diverse client projects, primarily focusing on front-end development with JavaScript. I also handle back-end tasks using NodeJS. My role includes leading small teams as a coach and technical advisor.
highlights: Expertise in React and TypeScript, system design and architecture
Implementation of GraphQL (Apollo) and Express (NodeJS) solutions

work.name: CPAM de Calais
work.summary: Led efforts to enhance the intranet for the Calais social security office, focusing on performance and user experience.
highlights: Refactored and fixed bugs in the existing PHP codebase
Optimized server performance, resulting in faster load times

work.name: Gotek7
work.summary: Executed a short-term project to establish the company's online store, from design to integration.
highlights: Designed visual assets in Photoshop and conducted product photography
Integrated designs into a functional Prestashop e-commerce platform

work.name: Reference Hit
work.summary: Worked in a startup environment where flexibility was key. Primarily focused on web design, with additional responsibilities in site integration and development using Prestashop.
highlights: Created web designs using Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator
Integrated and developed websites using Prestashop

work.name: Calais City Hall
work.summary: Assisted in designing a comprehensive database to catalog all addresses in Calais.
highlights: Designed the database using the Merise method
Developed user interfaces with Access and VBA
Gained proficiency in Geographic Information Systems (GIS)

work.name: Naxeo
work.summary: Completed a work-study program followed by a permanent position, working with a variety of high-profile clients.
highlights: Integrated numerous websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

skills.name: Frontend
keywords: CSS / Tailwind / CSS Modules / BEM / Styled Components
